{{Lang|'''Kamisato Ayato'''{{Name Order|Japanese}}|ja=神里綾人|ja_rm=Kamisato Ayato}} is a playable {{Hydro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

He is the current head of the [[Kamisato Clan]], the older brother of [[Kamisato Ayaka]], and the [[Yashiro Commission]]er. Resourceful and cunning, Ayato keeps a lower profile than his sister and focuses on government affairs in the Commission.
